DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize , control interventional study determine effect high intensity exercise training program objective sleep measure , daytime sleepiness , mobility , brain health/functional connectivity patient Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects High Intensity Exercise Training Program Patients With Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The primary outcome measure change sleep efficiency ( number minute asleep divide number minute bed ) , measure polysomnography . In addition , patient Parkinson 's disease excessive sleepiness/impaired vigilance ( alertness ) impair motor function , might expect improve exercise intervention , study also assess vigilance motor outcome .
DOC.criteria: PD participant 1 . Subjects clinical diagnosis idiopathic Parkinson 's disease base presence bradykinesia one following : rest tremor and/or rigidity 2 . Hoehn Yahr stage 2 3 3 . Stable dopaminergic medication regimen least 4 week prior study entry without anticipation medication change duration study . 4 . Stable dos medication know affect sleep medication Parkinson 's disease least 4 week prior study entry without anticipation medication change duration study . 5 . Age 45 great time study entry 6 . Asymmetric onset PD 7 . Progressive motor symptom PD 8 . Poor sleep quality ( Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index score > 5 ) 9 . MoCA score 1826 10 . Ability travel UAB 3x/week 16 week duration study exercise training session well study visit 11 . Subjects must pass physical examination PARQ ass exercise readiness Healthy Controls 1 . Age 45 great time study entry 2 . Poor sleep quality ( Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index score > 5 ) 3 . Normal cognition PD Participants 1 . Atypical feature indicative Parkinson 's Plus disorder ( Progressive Supranuclear Palsy , Multiple Systems Atrophy , Corticobasal Degeneration ) include cerebellar sign , supranuclear gaze palsy , apraxia , prominent autonomic failure , cortical sign . 2 . Neuroleptic treatment time onset Parkinsonism 3 . Active treatment neuroleptic time study entry 4 . History multiple stroke stepwise progression Parkinsonism 5 . History multiple head injury 6 . Inability walk without assistance , include cane , wheelchair , walker 7 . Regular participation exercise program within past 6 month 8 . Deep Brain Stimulation 9 . Untreated sleep apnea 10 . Known narcolepsy 11 . Participation drug study use investigational drug within 30 day prior screen 12 . Acute illness active , confound medical , neurological , musculoskeletal condition , discretion PI , would prevent subject 's ability participate study 13 . Known contraindication test 14 . Active alcoholism drug addiction 15 . Pregnancy Exclusion criterion PD subject undergoing image study : 1 . Pacemaker metallic object would make MR image unsafe 2 .
